meanings.definition: Of or relating to an apartment.
meanings.sent1: The apartmental decor gave the living room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: She loved the apartmental layout of her new home.
meanings.sent3: The apartmental curtains matched perfectly with the furniture.
meanings.sent4: His apartmental style reflected a modern aesthetic.
meanings.sent5: The apartmental design made the space feel welcoming.

meanings.sent1: The apartmental building had ten units for rent.
meanings.sent2: They lived in an apartmental complex with a shared courtyard.
meanings.sent3: The apartmental structure allowed for privacy among neighbors.
meanings.sent4: Each apartmental unit had its own entrance and mailbox.
meanings.sent5: The apartmental layout of the building made it easy to navigate.

meanings.definition: Suitable for use in an apartment.
meanings.sent1: The apartmental furniture was designed to fit small spaces.
meanings.sent2: She purchased apartmental appliances that were energy-efficient.
meanings.sent3: The apartmental rug was easy to clean and maintain.
meanings.sent4: He installed apartmental lighting fixtures to save space.
meanings.sent5: The apartmental decor was both stylish and functional.
